battlecode.common

Enum AnomalyType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<AnomalyType>
      • battlecode.common.AnomalyType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<AnomalyType>

    public enum AnomalyType
extends java.lang.Enum<AnomalyType>
    AnomalyType represents the type of a scheduled or envisioned Anomaly. You can access the type of scheduled Anomalies from AnomalyScheduleEntry.anomalyType, and envision your own Anomalies with Sages by using RobotController.envision(battlecode.common.AnomalyType).

    AnomalyType also provides information about the strenghts of each Anomaly, as well as other properties.

    Note that the Singularity is not included in the schedule. You should instead check GameConstants.GAME_MAX_NUMBER_OF_ROUNDS.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ABYSS
      Abyss causes proportional amounts of metal resources to be lost.
      CHARGE
      Charge deals concentrated damage to Droids.
      FURY
      Fury deals concentrated proportional damage to Turrets.
      VORTEX
      Vortex upends the world by transforming the map terrain.

      Whether this type of Anomaly could appear in the global schedule.
      boolean isSageAnomaly
      Whether this type of Anomaly could be envisioned by Sages.
      float sagePercentage
      The strength of this Anomaly when envisioned by a Sage.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • ABYSS

        public static final AnomalyType ABYSS
        Abyss causes proportional amounts of metal resources to be lost. When global, the entire map as well as team reserves are affected. When envisioned, a local region of the map is affected.

        globalPercentage and sagePercentage specify the proportion of metals lost.

      • CHARGE

        public static final AnomalyType CHARGE
        Charge deals concentrated damage to Droids. When global, the top globalPercentage Droids with the most nearby friendly units are destroyed. When envisioned, all nearby enemy Droids lose sagePercentage of their maximum health.

      • FURY

        public static final AnomalyType FURY
        Fury deals concentrated proportional damage to Turrets. When global, all Turrets are affected. When envisioned, a local region is affected.

        globalPercentage and sagePercentage specify the amount of damage dealt, as a proportion of the Turret's maximum health.

      • VORTEX

        public static final AnomalyType VORTEX
        Vortex upends the world by transforming the map terrain. It can only occur globally.

        The values of globalPercentage and sagePercentage are unused.

    • Field Detail

      • isGlobalAnomaly

        public final boolean isGlobalAnomaly
        Whether this type of Anomaly could appear in the global schedule.

      • isSageAnomaly

        public final boolean isSageAnomaly
        Whether this type of Anomaly could be envisioned by Sages.

      • globalPercentage

        public final float globalPercentage
        The strength of this Anomaly when globally scheduled. The precise definition of this value depends on the Anomaly type.

      • sagePercentage

        public final float sagePercentage
        The strength of this Anomaly when envisioned by a Sage. The precise definition of this value depends on the Anomaly type.
